bio.title: About
bio.bottomTitle: I am a full-stack web developer. I have also done some work with mobile development on both Android and iOS. My technical experience consists of working for many different tech based start-ups and well known companies. In my free time, I like learn new technologies, watch sports, workout, hike, going to hackathons, and hang out with friends.

experience.title: Spectoccular Labs
experience.description:
Designed, Maintained, and Refurbished company website and database from static to dynamic based implementation using data-driven techniques.

Created admin page where superuser can add, edit, modify, and remove categories and columns.

Researched different web frameworks, developed prototypes, maintained company web servers, and updated user interface by making it user friendly for visitors.

experience.title: Kaiser Permanente
experience.description:
Created a Community Benefit Mobile Application, which allows internal employees to enter hours and track progress for community benefit events.

Gained public speaking and presentation skills by presenting to CIO Phil Fasano on Social Media and its Impact on Healthcare.

Shared progress with managers during weekly meetings and presented to the management team about my overall internship experience.

experience.title: Mice & Pen
experience.description:
Created websites from scratch based on client’s requirements.

Updated client’s website with new information, improved layouts, and added new features to help improve the aesthetics and user experience.

experience.title: Ontraport
experience.description:
Tested a variety of features on Office Autopilot using Selenium IDE and wrote windows batch scripts to run multiple tests automatically.

Teamed with other interns to write an efficient master script in PHPUnit that covers all the UI features for Office Autopilot.
